name: Golden Glove

ingredients.name: White rum (Flor de Caña 4-Year-Old Extra Dry)

preparation:
This extra-citrusy cousin of the Daiquiri gets a kick from Cointreau.

Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.

Garnish with a lime half-wheel.
